description: Tool for automated Backups of Databases

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# DB Backup Tool Installation mit Environment Variables

set -e

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"

# Verwende Environment Variables statt Template-Substitution
REPO_URL="${GITHUB_REPOSITORY:-https://github.com/brandy23/db-backup-tool.git}"
REPO_BRANCH="${GITHUB_BRANCH:-main}"

echo "================================="
echo "DB BACKUP TOOL INSTALLATION"
echo "================================="
echo "Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "Target: ${APP_DIR}"
echo "================================="

# System Dependencies installieren
echo "[1/6] Installing system dependencies..."
apt update
apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git

# Node.js installieren
echo "[2/6] Installing Node.js..."
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Database Tools installieren
echo "[3/6] Installing database tools..."
apt install -y mysql-client || apt install -y default-mysql-client || echo "MySQL client failed"
apt install -y postgresql-client || apt install -y postgresql-client-common || echo "PostgreSQL client failed"

# MongoDB Tools
echo "Installing MongoDB tools..."
curl -fsSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-7.0.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg
echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian bookworm/mongodb-org/7.0 main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-7.0.list
apt update
apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || echo "MongoDB tools failed"

# Tools verifikation
echo "[4/6] Verifying tools..."
echo "Node.js: $(node --version)"
echo "NPM: $(npm --version)"
echo "Git: $(git --version)"

# Wechsel zum Zielverzeichnis
cd "${DIR}"

# Alte Installation entfernen
if [ -d "${APP_DIR}" ]; then
    echo "Removing old installation..."
    rm -rf "${APP_DIR}"
fi

# Repository Setup
echo "[5/6] Setting up repository..."
echo "Testing repository access: ${REPO_URL}"

# Test Repository-Zugriff
if ! git ls-remote --heads "${REPO_URL}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "ERROR: Repository '${REPO_URL}' is not accessible!"
    echo "Please check:"
    echo "1. Repository URL is correct"
    echo "2. Repository is public"
    echo "3. Repository exists"
    echo ""
    echo "Current environment variables:"
    echo "GITHUB_REPOSITORY: ${GITHUB_REPOSITORY}"
    echo "GITHUB_BRANCH: ${GITHUB_BRANCH}"
    echo ""
    echo "If these are empty, please set them in the server variables."
    exit 1
fi

# Test Branch-Existenz
if ! git ls-remote --heads "${REPO_URL}" | grep -q "refs/heads/${REPO_BRANCH}$"; then
    echo "ERROR: Branch '${REPO_BRANCH}' does not exist!"
    echo "Available branches:"
    git ls-remote --heads "${REPO_URL}" | sed 's/.*refs\/heads\///'
    exit 1
fi

# Repository klonen
echo "Cloning repository..."
if ! git clone -b "${REPO_BRANCH}" "${REPO_URL}" "${APP_DIR}"; then
    echo "ERROR: Git clone failed!"
    exit 1
fi

# Verifikation nach Clone
cd "${APP_DIR}"
echo "Repository cloned successfully to: $(pwd)"
echo "Contents:"
ls -la

# Pr√ºfe kritische Dateien
if [ ! -f "package.json" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: package.json not found in repository!"
    echo "Repository must contain package.json file."
    exit 1
fi

if [ ! -f "server.js" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: server.js not found in repository!"
    echo "Repository must contain server.js file."
    exit 1
fi

# Validiere package.json
if ! node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))"; then
    echo "ERROR: package.json is invalid JSON!"
    exit 1
fi

echo "‚úì All required files found and valid"

# Dependencies installieren
echo "[6/6] Installing dependencies..."
npm cache clean --force
if ! npm install --production; then
    echo "Trying with legacy-peer-deps..."
    npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps
fi

# Verzeichnisse erstellen
echo "Creating directories..."
mkdir -p backups logs config public

# Config erstellen
if [ ! -f "config.json" ]; then
    echo "Creating config.json..."
    cat > config.json << EOF
{
  "server": {
    "port": 8080,
    "host": "0.0.0.0"
  },
  "security": {
    "sessionSecret": "change-this-secret-key-in-production",
    "jwtSecret": "change-this-jwt-secret-in-production",
    "defaultAdmin": {
      "username": "admin",
      "password": "admin123"
    }
  },
  "backup": {
    "defaultPath": "./backups",
    "maxBackups": 10,
    "compression": true
  },
  "logging": {
    "level": "info",
    "file": "./logs/app.log"
  },
  "updates": {
    "autoUpdate": true,
    "repository": "${REPO_URL}",
    "branch": "${REPO_BRANCH}"
  }
}
EOF
fi

# Update-Script erstellen
cat > update.sh << EOF
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-Update Script

echo "üîÑ Checking for updates..."

# Backup configs
if [ -f "config.json" ]; then
    cp config.json config.json.backup
fi
if [ -f "backups/schedules.json" ]; then
    cp backups/schedules.json backups/schedules.json.backup
fi

# Git update
if [ -d ".git" ]; then
    git fetch origin
    LOCAL=\$(git rev-parse HEAD)
    REMOTE=\$(git rev-parse origin/${REPO_BRANCH})
    
    if [ "\$LOCAL" != "\$REMOTE" ]; then
        echo "üîÑ Update available, updating..."
        git reset --hard origin/${REPO_BRANCH}
        npm install --production
        mkdir -p backups logs config public
        
        # Restore configs
        if [ -f "config.json.backup" ]; then
            mv config.json.backup config.json
        fi
        if [ -f "backups/schedules.json.backup" ]; then
            mv backups/schedules.json.backup backups/schedules.json
        fi
        
        echo "‚úÖ Update completed"
    else
        echo "‚úÖ Already up to date"
    fi
fi
EOF

chmod +x update.sh

# Weitere Dateien
echo "[]" > backups/schedules.json
echo "* text=auto" > .gitattributes

# Berechtigungen
chmod 755 .
chmod 644 *.json *.js 2>/dev/null || true
chmod 755 backups logs config public 2>/dev/null || true

# Finale Verifikation
echo "================================="
echo "INSTALLATION COMPLETE"
echo "================================="
echo "Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "Git info: $(git remote get-url origin) ($(git rev-parse --short HEAD))"
echo "Node.js: $(node --version)"
echo "Critical files:"
ls -la package.json server.js config.json
echo "================================="

if [ ! -f "package.json" ] || [ ! -f "server.js" ]; then
    echo "CRITICAL ERROR: Missing required files!"
    exit 1
fi

echo "‚úÖ Installation successful!"
